data.actual_result: The picture is off-center, leaving a line at the top and the left side of the icon
data.expected_result: The picture is centered and there are no edges
data.short_description: Uploading a server Icon will leave lines
data.steps_to_repro: - create a server- On the create server modal, upload a server icon (size does not matter, but it's easiest recreateable with squared pictures or "banners")
